plugins.photosPermission: Allow Codex to access your photos so you can attach images in chat.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Codex to access your camera so you can capture images.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Codex to access your microphone for videos.

infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Allow Codex to notify you when a response finishes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Codex to access your photos so you can attach images in chat.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow Codex to save images to your photo library.
